Methods

GetFileHeader(string?)

Opens the file and reads first not empty line of text from it.

string GetFileHeader(string? mainDirPath)

Parameters

mainDirPath string

Absolute path of main directory.

Returns

string

If read line is a header (starts with '#') return it. Else return filename, without extension. If file header is a link return only text part.
